pin.title: App Lock (PIN)
pin.already: A PIN is currently set on this device.
pin.note: The PIN is stored locally as a salted SHA-256 hash. It protects access on this device only.
pin.minDigits: PIN must be at least 4 digits (numbers only).
pin.enabled: App lock enabled on this device.
pin.disabled: App lock disabled on this device.

pin.disableFail: Failed to disable PIN. Please try again.
